description:
The Terrifier film franchise is one of horror’s most recent examples of a true slasher icon. The property’s signature villain, Art the Clown, has entered pop culture stardom and it seems as though there’s no going back. In fact, Terrifier creator and franchise director Damien Leone has already confirmed Terrifier 4 is on the way. [...]

The post Damien Leone Confirms ‘Terrifier 4’ Is Happening appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Damien Leone Confirms ‘Terrifier 4’ Is Happening

description:
John Carpenter once stated his dislike of Rob Zombie’s 2007 remake of Halloween. Carpenter, who directed the original 1978 film, felt that Zombie’s reinterpretation altered the essence of what made Michael Myers a compelling and terrifying character. While the remake delved deeply into Michael’s backstory, showing his troubled childhood and the events that led to [...]

The post Why John Carpenter Wasn’t A Fan Of Rob Zombie’s ‘Halloween’ appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Why John Carpenter Wasn’t A Fan Of Rob Zombie’s ‘Halloween’
